metadata.name: We Breathe #10
metadata.description:
“We breathe” is a commentary on the state of the fashion industry exploring how models are stripped of their opinions, sexuality, and somewhat their souls. Walking like zombies with blank expressions on the runway then blooming into full glamour pose on command. Only then to retire backstage to stand perfectly still and bare in plain sight for a change of hair, makeup and wardrobe. Cue the next loop…

4K Video  
Shot in Bangkok

Augmented Reality prints available: waleedshah.ae/shop
